name: sleeping alone
description:
"sleeping alone" is a short retro PSX-style indie horror game.

Story

You are a 7-year-old child who finally has his own room. Sleeping alone sounds good, doesn't it? However, things don't go as planned.

Approximate playing time: 10 - 15 minutes

As a student, I would greatly appreciate any financial support. This is my first game and I created it in my free time. Thank you!

I appreciate every review!


Thank you for your positive comments on my game!

I'm thinking about making "sleeping alone 2" with a whole new better story, better mechanics and especially with a bit longer playing time. Probably in collaboration with other people. I will keep you posted on everything!

Credits

Additional sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music by BIIANSU

I will be happy if you also look at my other games.
